metadata.title: CVE-2017-11684 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
There is an illegal address access in the build_table function inlibavcodec/bitstream.c of Libav 12.1 that will lead to remote denial ofservice via crafted input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.0-1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat58 - 7:4.0-1
libavresample4 - 7:4.0-1
libavutil56 - 7:4.0-1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.0-1
libswresample3 - 7:4.0-1
libswscale5 - 7:4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.0-1').
